## Welcome to our guide page
You can visit here: https://lelouvincx.github.io/ubunchuu-truong-us.github.io/
### How to build this page by github pages?
1. Install Bundler
```
gem install bundler
bundle update
```
2. Clone source code
```
git clone https://github.com/lelouvincx/ubunchuu-truong-us.github.io
```
3. Run the blog on localhost
```
bundle exec jekyll serve
> ...
> Server address: http://127.0.0.1:4000
> Sever running... press ctrl-c to stop.
```
